title: The item differences
body: What are the differences between Hunter's Machete{{item:1041}} and Hunter's Tailsman{{item:1039}} .

replies.body:
The passive.

{{item:1041}}  - Gives you bonus lifesteal and your autos do more damage to monsters. (for auto attack based champs)

{{item:1039}} - Gives you bonus mana regen and your abilties do more damage to monsters (for spell based champs)

Generally that's the rule.
However depending on the champ you may choose to switch.

Depending on your starting runes and masteries you might want {{item:1039}} over {{item:1041}} for Yi/Udyr.
